Title: Relates to a STAR exemption for certain seniors who reside with a related property owner
Summary: Requires extending the eligibility for the basic STAR exemption and enhanced STAR exemption to real property owned by a non-spouse relative of a senior citizen who shares such primary residence with such senior citizen.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a STAR exemption for certain senior citizens who reside with a related property owner
